Caption: The chief guest of the convocation, Union Minister for Education Mr. M. C. Chagla is received by Registrar Mr. R. Natarajan (I.A.S.)
Description: This was Mr. Chagla's first ever visit to IIT Madras, as Dr. Mudaliar mentioned in his welcome speech. Chagla praised the staff and students for the well organised convocation ceremony. The car in the picture appears to be a Plymouth of the 1950s. Plymouth cars were produced and distributed by the Chrysler Corporation in the United States. They ran from 1928 up until 2001, after which the production discontinued.
